page.title: 12HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content: settlement , Frinton and Walton. The tenure of the area is diverse and distinct from that of the Tendring district and Essex.There is a large number of owner occupied households with a decrease in private rented housing. The area of Frinton and Walton as a whole has a low level of public housing provision compared with the Tendring district. The owner occupied % of households for Frinton and Walton in 1981 was 82% against an average of 64% for Essex.The local authority housing was 7.8% in 1981 against an average of 26.2% for the whole of Essex in that same year. The number of people of pensionable age in the area is reflected in the household size, 75.5% of households being 2 persons or less. In 1981 census material showed
